name: AfperFIT™
description: AfperFIT™is a supercritical CO₂ extract of maniguette pepper containing over 2% 6-Paradol. AfperFITTM has been clinically demonstrated to stimulate all three types of fatty tissue (white, brown and BRITE). Our extract will increase fat and carbohydrate consumption and therefore allow weight loss without negative effect on muscle mass. Clinical results also showed that subjects increased their mental quality of life, without altering physical perception, indicating a certain self- esteem. An extract with 10% 6-Paradol as oleoresin is also available.
